intro: Prenia vanrensburgii, commonly known as the Van Rensburg's prenia, is a rare and endemic plant species native to South Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family and is characterized by its compact, shrub-like growth habit. The plant features small, narrow leaves and produces yellowish to orange-colored flowers. It thrives in rocky, well-drained soils and is often found in coastal and mountainous regions. Due to its limited distribution and habitat specificity, it is considered a vulnerable species.
